name: The Block
title: Data Insights Meteoras Meteoric Rise Gm Usa
text:
Synopsis
The cryptocurrency market is experiencing significant shifts, with Solana emerging as a dominant platform for token launches and US-based crypto protocols gaining momentum, driven by regulatory clarity and political developments.

Key Insights
- Meteora, a Solana-based DEX, saw unprecedented growth with $33 billion in trading volume in January, representing a 33x increase from December
- Solana now hosts 96% of new token launches, with projections suggesting over 100 million tokens could be launched by end of 2025
- The GMCI USA Select Index of US-based crypto protocols has grown 183% since November, rising from $95 to $269.04
- President Trump's executive order supporting US cryptocurrency leadership has fueled increased attention on domestically-based protocols
- Ethereum's network activity is rebounding, with active addresses increasing 37% to 575,000 and daily transactions rising to 1.3 million
- Bitget token (BGB) has outperformed other exchange tokens, rising over 320% since December 1, 2024
- Sky Protocol's stablecoin (USDS) has grown 135% in five months, replacing DAI as its primary stablecoin
- Institutional investors are showing increased interest, with elevated volumes across Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs
